plot: A clay animation about the bond between mother and child. We follow the relationship of a boy and his mother through life starting at the point of conception and ending when the boy himself becomes a father.
title: Fäst vid dig
plot_es: A clay animation about the bond between mother and child. We follow the relationship of a boy and his mother through life starting at the point of conception and ending when the boy himself becomes a father.
plot_en: A clay animation about the bond between mother and child. We follow the relationship of a boy and his mother through life starting at the point of conception and ending when the boy himself becomes a father.
